content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for ways to use the Pandas library in Python. The search returned several links to articles on the topic, which I saved for future reference.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.scholastic.com/home/", "question": "What educational materials and activities are available for children on the Scholastic website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: promoting Scholastic's educational materials and activities for children, including literacy and math resources, book fairs and clubs, and teaching resources. The website also features book reviews and information on new book releases, and offers Little Skill Seekers Workbooks for early literacy, numeracy, and cognitive skills. Contact information for Scholastic representatives and customer support is provided.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to main content (https://www.scholastic.com/home/#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.scholastic.com/en)', 'Catalogs  (javscript:void(0))', 'Catalogs (https://export.scholastic.com/en/catalogs)', 'Education (https://export.scholastic.com/en/catalogs/education-material)']", type='action_result')]
"""
